mapper.select: select create_time, user_name, action from log_info where action in ('登录', '注销') order by create_time desc
select * from log_info order by create_time desc limit #{begin}, #{num}

select t1.*, t2.u_name as createUser from log_info t1 join t_user t2 on t1.create_user = t2.u_id
1=1
and t2.u_name like concat('%',#{po.uName},'%')
and action =#{po.action}
and action in("登录","注销")
and t1.create_time >= concat(#{po.beginDate},' 00:00:00')
and t1.create_time <= concat(#{po.endDate},' 23:59:59')
order by create_time desc

select t1.*, t2.u_name as createUser from log_info t1 join t_user t2 on t1.create_user = t2.u_id
1=1
and t2.u_name like concat('%',#{po.uName},'%')
and action =#{po.action}
and action not in("登录","注销")
and t1.create_time >= concat(#{po.beginDate},' 00:00:00')
and t1.create_time <= concat(#{po.endDate},' 23:59:59')
order by create_time desc
